```html
  <div class="mt-4 space-y-2">
    <div class="mw-skeleton" style="height: 0.75rem; width: 100%;"></div>
    <div class="mw-skeleton" style="height: 0.75rem; width: 90%;"></div>
    <div class="mw-skeleton" style="height: 0.75rem; width: 75%;"></div>
  </div>
</div>
```

### Slider

```html
<!-- Marrow UI: Slider -->
<!-- A range slider input for selecting numeric values -->
<!-- Requires: Tailwind CSS, Alpine.js, marrow.css, marrow.js -->

<div x-data="mwSlider(0, 100, 50)" class="space-y-4">
  <div class="flex items-center justify-between">
    <label class="mw-label">Volume</label>
    <span class="text-sm text-muted-foreground" x-text="value + '%'"></span>
  </div>

  <div class="relative pt-1">
    <!-- Visual track -->
    <div class="mw-slider-track">
      <div class="mw-slider-range" :style="'width: ' + percentage + '%'"></div>
    </div>
    <!-- Invisible native range input -->
    <input type="range" :min="min" :max="max"
           x-model="value" @input="handleInput($event)"
           class="absolute inset-0 w-full opacity-0 cursor-pointer"
           style="margin: 0; height: 0.375rem;">
  </div>
</div>
```

### Sonner

```html
<!-- Marrow UI: Sonner -->
<!-- Toast notifications with auto-dismiss and multiple variants -->
<!-- Requires: Tailwind CSS, Alpine.js, marrow.css, marrow.js -->

<button class="mw-btn mw-btn-primary"
  @click="$store.toasts.add({
    title: 'Success!',
    description: 'Your changes have been saved.',
    type: 'success'
  })">
  Show Toast
</button>
```

### Spinner

```html
<!-- Marrow UI: Spinner -->
<!-- A loading spinner indicator for asynchronous operations -->
<!-- Requires: Tailwind CSS, Alpine.js, marrow.css, marrow.js -->

<!-- Small -->
<div class="mw-spinner" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></div>

<!-- Default -->
<div class="mw-spinner"></div>

<!-- Large -->
<div class="mw-spinner" style="width: 2rem; height: 2rem; border-width: 3px;"></div>

<!-- Inline with text -->
<div class="flex items-center gap-3">
  <div class="mw-spinner"></div>
  <span class="text-sm text-muted-foreground">Loading data...</span>
</div>

<!-- Inside a button -->
<button class="mw-btn mw-btn-primary" disabled>
  <div class="mw-spinner"
       style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;
              border-color: hsl(var(--marrow-primary-foreground) / 0.3);
              border-top-color: hsl(var(--marrow-primary-foreground));"></div>
  Submitting...
</button>
```

### Switch

```html
<!-- Marrow UI: Switch -->
<!-- A toggle switch for on/off states -->
<!-- Requires: Tailwind CSS, Alpine.js, marrow.css, marrow.js -->

<!-- Switch (off by default) -->
<div class="flex items-center gap-3" x-data="mwSwitch()">
  <button class="mw-switch"
          :data-state="checked ? 'checked' : 'unchecked'"
          @click="toggle()"
          role="switch"
          :aria-checked="checked">
    <span class="mw-switch-thumb"></span>
  </button>
  <span class="text-sm" x-text="checked ? 'On' : 'Off'"></span>
</div>

<!-- Switch (on by default) -->
<div class="flex items-center gap-3" x-data="mwSwitch(true)">
  <button class="mw-switch"
          :data-state="checked ? 'checked' : 'unchecked'"
          @click="toggle()"
          role="switch"
          :aria-checked="checked">
    <span class="mw-switch-thumb"></span>
  </button>
  <span class="text-sm" x-text="checked ? 'On' : 'Off'"></span>
</div>

<!-- Switch with label -->
<div class="flex items-center gap-3" x-data="mwSwitch()">
  <button class="mw-switch"
          :data-state="checked ? 'checked' : 'unchecked'"
          @click="toggle()"
          role="switch"
          :aria-checked="checked"
          id="airplane-mode">
    <span class="mw-switch-thumb"></span>
  </button>
  <label for="airplane-mode" class="mw-label cursor-pointer">Airplane Mode</label>
</div>

<!-- Disabled switch -->
<div class="flex items-center gap-3" x-data="mwSwitch()">
  <button class="mw-switch opacity-50 pointer-events-none"
          :data-state="checked ? 'checked' : 'unchecked'"
          role="switch"
          :aria-checked="checked"
          disabled>
    <span class="mw-switch-thumb"></span>
  </button>
  <span class="text-sm text-muted-foreground">Disabled</span>
</div>
```

### Table

```html
<!-- Marrow UI: Table -->
<!-- A data table for displaying structured information -->
<!-- Requires: Tailwind CSS, Alpine.js, marrow.css, marrow.js -->

<div class="overflow-x-auto">
  <table class="mw-table">
    <thead>
      <tr>
        <th>Invoice</th>
        <th>Status</th>
        <th>Method</th>
        <th class="text-right">Amount</th>
      </tr>
    </thead>
    <tbody>
      <tr>
        <td class="font-medium">INV-001</td>
        <td><span class="mw-badge mw-badge-default">Paid</span></td>
        <td class="text-muted-foreground">Credit Card</td>
        <td class="text-right">$250.00</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td class="font-medium">INV-002</td>
        <td><span class="mw-badge mw-badge-outline">Pending</span></td>
        <td class="text-muted-foreground">PayPal</td>
        <td class="text-right">$150.00</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td class="font-medium">INV-003</td>
        <td><span class="mw-badge mw-badge-default">Paid</span></td>
        <td class="text-muted-foreground">Bank Transfer</td>
        <td class="text-right">$350.00</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td class="font-medium">INV-004</td>
        <td><span class="mw-badge mw-badge-destructive">Overdue</span></td>
        <td class="text-muted-foreground">Credit Card</td>
        <td class="text-right">$450.00</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td class="font-medium">INV-005</td>
        <td><span class="mw-badge mw-badge-default">Paid</span></td>
        <td class="text-muted-foreground">PayPal</td>
        <td class="text-right">$550.00</td>
      </tr>
    </tbody>
  </table>
</div>
```

### Tabs

```html
<!-- Marrow UI: Tabs -->
<!-- Tabbed navigation for switching between content panels -->
<!-- Requires: Tailwind CSS, Alpine.js, marrow.css, marrow.js -->

<div x-data="mwTabs('tab1')">
  <!-- Tab triggers -->
  <div class="mw-tabs-list">
    <button class="mw-tab-trigger"
            :data-state="isActive('tab1') ? 'active' : ''"
            @click="setActive('tab1')">Account</button>
    <button class="mw-tab-trigger"
            :data-state="isActive('tab2') ? 'active' : ''"
            @click="setActive('tab2')">Password</button>
    <button class="mw-tab-trigger"
            :data-state="isActive('tab3') ? 'active' : ''"
            @click="setActive('tab3')">Notifications</button>
  </div>

  <!-- Tab panels -->
  <div class="mt-4">
    <div x-show="isActive('tab1')">
      <h3 class="font-heading font-semibold">Account Settings</h3>
      <p class="text-sm text-muted-foreground">Update your account information.</p>
      <!-- Panel content -->
    </div>

    <div x-show="isActive('tab2')" x-cloak>
      <h3 class="font-heading font-semibold">Change Password</h3>
      <p class="text-sm text-muted-foreground">Update your password.</p>
      <!-- Panel content -->
    </div>

    <div x-show="isActive('tab3')" x-cloak>
      <h3 class="font-heading font-semibold">Notification Preferences</h3>
      <p class="text-sm text-muted-foreground">Choose how you want to be notified.</p>
      <!-- Panel content -->
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
```

### Textarea

```html
<!-- Marrow UI: Textarea -->
<!-- A multi-line text input field -->
<!-- Requires: Tailwind CSS, Alpine.js, marrow.css, marrow.js -->

<!-- Default textarea -->
<div class="space-y-2">
  <label class="mw-label">Message</label>
  <textarea class="mw-textarea"></textarea>
</div>

<!-- With placeholder -->
<div class="space-y-2">
  <label class="mw-label">Message</label>
  <textarea class="mw-textarea" placeholder="Type your message here..."></textarea>
</div>

<!-- Disabled -->
<div class="space-y-2">
  <label class="mw-label">Message</label>
  <textarea class="mw-textarea" disabled placeholder="This textarea is disabled..."></textarea>
</div>
```

### Toast

```html
<!-- Marrow UI: Toast -->
<!-- Temporary notification messages that appear at the bottom-right -->
<!-- Requires: Tailwind CSS, Alpine.js, marrow.css, marrow.js -->

<!-- Trigger buttons -->
<button class="mw-btn mw-btn-primary"
        @click="$store.toasts.add({ type: 'success', title: 'Success', message: 'Your changes have been saved.' })">
  Success Toast
</button>

<button class="mw-btn mw-btn-destructive"
        @click="$store.toasts.add({ type: 'error', title: 'Error', message: 'Something went wrong.' })">
  Error Toast
</button>

<button class="mw-btn mw-btn-outline"
        @click="$store.toasts.add({ type: 'info', title: 'Info', message: 'A new update is available.' })">
  Info Toast
</button>

<!-- Toast container (place once, at the bottom of your page) -->
<div x-data
     class="fixed bottom-4 right-4 z-50 flex flex-col gap-2"
     style="pointer-events: none;">
  <template x-for="toast in $store.toasts.items" :key="toast.id">
    <div class="mw-card flex items-start gap-3 min-w-[20rem] max-w-sm shadow-lg"
         style="pointer-events: auto;"
         x-transition:enter="transition ease-out duration-200"
         x-transition:enter-start="opacity-0 translate-y-2"
         x-transition:enter-end="opacity-100 translate-y-0"
         x-transition:leave="transition ease-in duration-150"
         x-transition:leave-start="opacity-100 translate-y-0"
         x-transition:leave-end="opacity-0 translate-y-2">
      <!-- Icon (conditional on toast.type) -->
      <template x-if="toast.type === 'success'">
        <svg class="w-5 h-5 text-green-500 shrink-0 mt-0.5" ...></svg>
      </template>
      <template x-if="toast.type === 'error'">
        <svg class="w-5 h-5 text-red-500 shrink-0 mt-0.5" ...></svg>
      </template>
      <template x-if="toast.type === 'info'">
        <svg class="w-5 h-5 text-blue-500 shrink-0 mt-0.5" ...></svg>
      </template>
      <!-- Content -->
      <div class="flex-1 min-w-0">
        <p class="font-medium text-sm" x-text="toast.title"></p>
        <p class="text-sm text-muted-foreground" x-text="toast.message"></p>
      </div>
      <!-- Close button -->
      <button @click="$store.toasts.remove(toast.id)"
              class="shrink-0 text-muted-foreground hover:text-foreground">
        <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2"><path d="M18 6 6 18"/><path d="m6 6 12 12"/></svg>
      </button>
    </div>
  </template>
</div>
```

### Toggle Group

```html
<!-- Marrow UI: Toggle Group -->
<!-- A group of toggle buttons where one or multiple can be selected -->
<!-- Requires: Tailwind CSS, Alpine.js, marrow.css, marrow.js -->

<!-- Single selection toggle group -->
<div x-data="mwToggleGroup('single', 'center')"
     class="inline-flex gap-1 bg-muted rounded-[var(--marrow-radius)] p-1">
  <button class="mw-toggle"
          :data-state="isSelected('left') ? 'on' : 'off'"
          @click="select('left')">
    <svg ...>Align Left</svg>
  </button>
  <button class="mw-toggle"
          :data-state="isSelected('center') ? 'on' : 'off'"
          @click="select('center')">
    <svg ...>Align Center</svg>
  </button>
  <button class="mw-toggle"
          :data-state="isSelected('right') ? 'on' : 'off'"
          @click="select('right')">
    <svg ...>Align Right</svg>
  </button>
</div>

<!-- Multiple selection toggle group -->
<div x-data="mwToggleGroup('multiple', ['bold'])"
     class="inline-flex gap-1 bg-muted rounded-[var(--marrow-radius)] p-1">
  <button class="mw-toggle"
          :data-state="isSelected('bold') ? 'on' : 'off'"
          @click="select('bold')">
    <svg ...>Bold</svg>
  </button>
  <button class="mw-toggle"
          :data-state="isSelected('italic') ? 'on' : 'off'"
          @click="select('italic')">
    <svg ...>Italic</svg>
  </button>
  <button class="mw-toggle"
          :data-state="isSelected('underline') ? 'on' : 'off'"
          @click="select('underline')">
    <svg ...>Underline</svg>
  </button>
</div>
```

### Toggle

```html
<!-- Marrow UI: Toggle -->
<!-- A two-state button that can be pressed or unpressed -->
<!-- Requires: Tailwind CSS, Alpine.js, marrow.css, marrow.js -->

<!-- Toggle (unpressed by default) -->
<div x-data="mwToggle()">
  <button class="mw-toggle"
          :data-state="pressed ? 'on' : 'off'"
          @click="toggle()"
          :aria-pressed="pressed">
    <svg ...>Bold icon</svg>
  </button>
</div>

<!-- Toggle (pressed by default) -->
<div x-data="mwToggle(true)">
  <button class="mw-toggle"
          :data-state="pressed ? 'on' : 'off'"
          @click="toggle()"
          :aria-pressed="pressed">
    <svg ...>Italic icon</svg>
  </button>
</div>

<!-- Toggle with text label -->
<div x-data="mwToggle()">
  <button class="mw-toggle !aspect-auto px-3 gap-2"
          :data-state="pressed ? 'on' : 'off'"
          @click="toggle()"
          :aria-pressed="pressed">
    <svg ...>Icon</svg>
    <span class="text-sm">Wrap</span>
  </button>
</div>
```

### Tooltip

```html
<!-- Marrow UI: Tooltip -->
<!-- A popup that displays information on hover -->
<!-- Requires: Tailwind CSS, Alpine.js, marrow.css, marrow.js -->

<!-- Tooltip on a button -->
<div x-data="mwTooltip()" class="relative inline-block">
  <button class="mw-btn mw-btn-outline"
          @mouseenter="enter()"
          @mouseleave="leave()">
    Hover me
  </button>
  <div x-show="show"
       x-cloak
       x-transition:enter="transition ease-out duration-150"
       x-transition:enter-start="opacity-0 translate-y-1"
       x-transition:enter-end="opacity-100 translate-y-0"
       x-transition:leave="transition ease-in duration-100"
       x-transition:leave-start="opacity-100 translate-y-0"
       x-transition:leave-end="opacity-0 translate-y-1"
       class="mw-tooltip absolute left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 bottom-full mb-2 z-50">
    This is a tooltip
  </div>
</div>

<!-- Tooltip on an icon button -->
<div x-data="mwTooltip()" class="relative inline-block">
  <button class="mw-btn mw-btn-ghost mw-btn-icon"
          @mouseenter="enter()"
          @mouseleave="leave()">
    <svg ...>Icon</svg>
  </button>
  <div x-show="show"
       x-cloak
       class="mw-tooltip absolute left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 bottom-full mb-2 z-50">
    More information
  </div>
</div>

<!-- Tooltip on text -->
<div x-data="mwTooltip()" class="relative inline-block">
  <span class="underline decoration-dashed underline-offset-4 cursor-help"
        @mouseenter="enter()"
        @mouseleave="leave()">
    What is this?
  </span>
  <div x-show="show"
       x-cloak
       class="mw-tooltip absolute left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 bottom-full mb-2 z-50">
    A helpful explanation
  </div>
</div>
```

### Typography

```html
<!-- Marrow UI: Typography -->
<!-- Heading levels, body text, inline code, blockquotes, and lists -->
<!-- Requires: Tailwind CSS, Alpine.js, marrow.css, marrow.js -->

<!-- Headings -->
<h1 class="font-heading text-4xl font-extrabold tracking-tight lg:text-5xl">Heading 1</h1>
<h2 class="font-heading text-3xl font-semibold tracking-tight border-b pb-2">Heading 2</h2>
<h3 class="font-heading text-2xl font-semibold tracking-tight">Heading 3</h3>
<h4 class="font-heading text-xl font-semibold tracking-tight">Heading 4</h4>
<h5 class="font-heading text-lg font-semibold tracking-tight">Heading 5</h5>
<h6 class="font-heading text-base font-semibold tracking-tight">Heading 6</h6>

<!-- Paragraph -->
<p class="leading-7">Standard body text with comfortable line height.</p>

<!-- Lead paragraph -->
<p class="text-lg text-muted-foreground leading-relaxed">A lead paragraph for introductions.</p>

<!-- Small text -->
<p class="text-sm text-muted-foreground">Small muted text for secondary info.</p>

<!-- Inline code -->
<p>Use the <code class="px-1.5 py-0.5 bg-muted rounded text-sm font-mono">mw-btn</code> class.</p>

<!-- Blockquote -->
<blockquote class="border-l-4 border-primary pl-4 italic text-muted-foreground">
  "A meaningful quote goes here."
  <footer class="mt-2 text-sm not-italic">&mdash; Author Name</footer>
</blockquote>

<!-- Unordered list -->
<ul class="list-disc pl-6 space-y-1 leading-7">
  <li>First item</li>
  <li>Second item</li>
  <li>Third item</li>
</ul>

<!-- Ordered list -->
<ol class="list-decimal pl-6 space-y-1 leading-7">
  <li>Step one</li>
  <li>Step two</li>
  <li>Step three</li>
</ol>
```


## CSS Classes Reference

### Buttons
| Class | Description |
|-------|-------------|
| .mw-btn | Base button |
| .mw-btn-primary | Primary variant |
| .mw-btn-secondary | Secondary variant |
| .mw-btn-outline | Outline variant |
| .mw-btn-ghost | Ghost variant |
| .mw-btn-destructive | Destructive/danger variant |
| .mw-btn-link | Link-style variant |
| .mw-btn-sm | Small size |
| .mw-btn-lg | Large size |
| .mw-btn-icon | Icon-only square button |

### Form Controls
| Class | Description |
|-------|-------------|
| .mw-input | Text input |
| .mw-textarea | Multi-line input |
| .mw-select | Custom select |
| .mw-label | Form label |
| .mw-checkbox | Checkbox |
| .mw-radio | Radio button |
| .mw-switch | Toggle switch |
| .mw-switch-thumb | Switch thumb element |
| .mw-slider-track | Slider track |
| .mw-slider-range | Slider filled range |
| .mw-slider-thumb | Slider thumb |

### Layout
| Class | Description |
|-------|-------------|
| .mw-card | Card container |
| .mw-separator | Horizontal divider |
| .mw-separator-vertical | Vertical divider |
| .mw-scroll-area | Custom scrollbar container |
| .mw-resizable-handle | Panel resize handle |

### Feedback
| Class | Description |
|-------|-------------|
| .mw-badge | Status badge |
| .mw-badge-default | Default badge variant |
| .mw-badge-secondary | Secondary badge variant |
| .mw-badge-outline | Outline badge variant |
| .mw-badge-destructive | Destructive badge variant |
| .mw-alert | Alert message |
| .mw-progress | Progress bar container |
| .mw-progress-bar | Progress bar fill |
| .mw-skeleton | Loading skeleton |
| .mw-spinner | Loading spinner |

### Overlays
| Class | Description |
|-------|-------------|
| .mw-overlay | Modal backdrop |
| .mw-dialog | Dialog container |
| .mw-sheet | Sheet panel |
| .mw-popover | Popover container |
| .mw-tooltip | Tooltip container |

### Navigation
| Class | Description |
|-------|-------------|
| .mw-tabs-list | Tab list container |
| .mw-tab-trigger | Tab button |
| .mw-breadcrumb | Breadcrumb nav |
| .mw-pagination-item | Pagination button |
| .mw-menu-item | Dropdown menu item |

### Other
| Class | Description |
|-------|-------------|
| .mw-avatar | Avatar container |
| .mw-avatar-sm | Small avatar |
| .mw-avatar-lg | Large avatar |
| .mw-kbd | Keyboard shortcut |
| .mw-toggle | Toggle button |
| .mw-empty | Empty state |
| .mw-code-block | Code block container |

### Data Attributes
| Attribute | Usage |
|-----------|-------|
| data-state="checked" | Checked state for checkbox, switch |
| data-state="unchecked" | Unchecked state for checkbox, switch |
| data-state="active" | Active tab trigger |
| data-state="on" | Toggle pressed state |
